name: hunter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or an animal that hunts animals for food or for sport: Animals in the cat family are hunters.
a type of horse, especially one used in hunting animals
More examplesFewer examplesThe hunters followed the tracks of the deer for hours.The hunters skinned the deer they had killed.The hunters came riding by/past on their horses.The hunters spent hours pursuing their prey.In the story, the cunning fox outwits the hunters.
